DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Aspiration Hydrosalpingeal Fluid IVF-ET Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: A Cochrane review prospective randomize trial laparoscopic salpingectomy confirm beneficial effect laparoscopic salpingectomy IVF ET outcomes patient hydrosalpinges . Surgery usually safe especially patient extensive adhesion , morbid obesity previous multiple laparotomy . Other less invasive option patient hydrosalpinges ultrasound guide aspiration hydrosalpingeal fluid , antibiotic hysteroscopic occlusion fallopian tube study order find alternative salpingectomy . Although method simple get popular , current data inadequate recommend treatment option instead salpingectomy . The aim study determine whether ultrasound guide aspiration hydrosalpingeal fluid time oocyte retrieval improve outcomes IVF-ET .
DOC.criteria: Patients unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinges visible ultrasound Age 18 37 year Period infertility > 1 year Body mass index 1929 Normal basal luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) prolactin concentration Normal recent semen analysis ( accord World Health Organization criterion ) Uterine fibroid require surgical removal Endometriosis Male factor infertility require ICSI Previous IVF cycle History recurrent miscarriage Endocrinologic disorder Presence systemic disease contraindicate pregnancy
